name: ProjectAzide.GitHub.io
tagline: Welcome to Project Azide, an open-source plenoptic (holographic) display architecture
body:
### 2016-10-09: NoCo Mini Maker Faire, Loveland Colorado
We just completed the [NoCo Mini Maker Faire](https://makerfairenoco.com/), it was great to meet so many of you.

Now that Maker Faire is over, we'll have a chance to add actual content here on the website.  Thanks for your patience.

[Our organization's repository](https://github.com/ProjectAzide) @ProjectAzide

@mew-cx
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
